page.title: 07DALBEATTIE HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: Dalbeattie has three doctors and one dentist. It has one full time health visitor,two full time district nurses and one part time nurse.There is one bathing attendant and one person who is a health visitor and a mid-wife. Each day about 100 patients are treated.Any prescriptions written by doctors can be collected at the local chemist's. Emergency cases are taken by ambulance to Dumfries & Galloway Royal Infirmary.There is also a Maternity Hospital at Cresswell, Dumfries. Munches Park House in the town is an Old People's Home. There are two school nurses, one school doctor and a school dentist who keep a close check on the health of all the school children in the area.
